forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 42 in the afternoon. West wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 16. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston today, an air of mild uncertainty sweeps across the landscape, as evening approaches. This afternoon, the skies appear to be wrestling with a few stubborn clouds, casting a gentle shadow over the city. The temperature, lingering around the mid-fifties, will soon retreat into the chill of the evening. A brisk wind from the west whips through the streets, adding a sharp edge to the air that invites a layered approach to attire; sturdy jackets and warm scarves will be your allies against gusts reaching nearly thirty miles per hour.

As night descends, the clouds gradually give way to a clearer but stark sky, with temperatures dropping to an unforgiving sixteen degrees. The atmosphere hums with possibility, yet one might find solace in the warmth of a cozy café, nestled among the city’s myriad inviting corners. A stroll along the waterfront could reveal the ethereal beauty of the fading horizon, but do keep your gloves nearby, as the crisp air begs for warmth. Embrace the rugged allure of the day, perhaps with a warm beverage in hand, as you connect with the evening's solitude.
